pages.courses: DriveEasy - Premier Driving School in India | driving courses Home Courses How we work About us Courses ₹5,000 Beginner Driving Course Ideal for those with little to no driving experience. Learn the basics of driving in a safe and supportive environment. 15 hours of driving lessons Basic vehicle control Introduction to traffic rules City driving practice Free theory classes Choose ₹7,500 Intermediate Driving Course For those with some driving experience looking to enhance their skills and confidence on the road. 20 hours of driving lessons Advanced vehicle control Highway driving practice Parking techniques Free theory classes Choose ₹10,000 Advanced Defensive Driving Course Perfect for experienced drivers wanting to learn advanced defensive driving techniques. 25 hours of driving lessons Defensive driving techniques Emergency maneuvering Night driving practice Free theory classes Choose ₹6,000 Refresher Course Designed for licensed drivers who need a refresher on driving skills and techniques. 10 hours of driving lessons Review of traffic rules Parking and reversing City and highway driving Free theory classes Choose ₹12,000 Comprehensive Driving Course A complete package for beginners, covering all aspects of driving from basics to advanced techniques. 30 hours of driving lessons Basic and advanced vehicle control City and highway driving Defensive driving techniques Free theory classes Choose ₹8,000 Weekend Driving Course For busy individuals who can only take lessons on weekends. Learn to drive without disrupting your work week. 20 hours of driving lessons Flexible weekend schedules City driving practice Parking techniques Free theory classes Choose Why Choose DriveEasy? At DriveEasy, we are committed to providing you with the best driving education experience. Our comprehensive courses and expert instructors ensure you become a confident and responsible driver. Here are some key features that set us apart: Experienced Instructors Our certified instructors have years of experience in teaching driving, ensuring you receive top-quality guidance. Flexible Scheduling We offer flexible class schedules, including weekends and evenings, to fit your busy lifestyle. Safety First Our training vehicles are equipped with the latest safety features, ensuring a secure learning environment. Comprehensive Courses From beginner to advanced levels, our courses cover all aspects of driving to meet your needs. High Success Rate Our students consistently pass their driving tests with high scores, thanks to our effective teaching methods. Supportive Environment We create a supportive and encouraging learning atmosphere, helping you feel confident on the road. What courses does DriveEasy offer? DriveEasy offers a variety of courses tailored to different skill levels, including Beginner Driving Course, Intermediate Driving Course, Advanced Defensive Driving Course, Refresher Course, Comprehensive Driving Course, and Weekend Driving Course. What are the class timings? We offer flexible scheduling options, including weekday, weekend, and evening classes to accommodate your busy lifestyle. Specific timings can be arranged directly with your instructor. Do I need a learner's permit to start driving lessons? Yes, you need a valid learner's permit before you can start your driving lessons with DriveEasy. Our team can help you with the process of obtaining your learner's permit if needed. What type of vehicles are used for training? We use modern, well-maintained vehicles equipped with the latest safety features for all our driving courses. This ensures a safe and comfortable learning experience for our students. How do I book a course? Booking a course is easy. You can visit our website, choose the desired course, and fill out the registration form. Alternatively, you can contact our office directly to book your course over the phone. What is the fee structure for the courses? The fees for our courses vary depending on the type and duration of the course. For example, our Beginner Driving Course is priced at ₹5,000, while our Comprehensive Driving Course is ₹12,000. Detailed fee structures for all courses are available on our website. pages.index: DriveEasy - Premier Driving School in India Home Courses How we work About us Master the Road with DriveEasy Join DriveEasy, India's top-rated driving school, and learn to drive with confidence and safety. Our experienced instructors and comprehensive courses are designed to meet the needs of every learner. View Courses 01 Personalized Lessons We tailor our driving lessons to meet the individual needs of each student, ensuring a personalized learning experience. 02 Experienced Instructors Our team of experienced and certified instructors provide expert guidance and support throughout your driving journey. 03 Flexible Scheduling We offer flexible scheduling options to fit your busy lifestyle, including weekends and evening classes. How We Work At DriveEasy, our mission is to provide a comprehensive and enjoyable learning experience. Here's how we achieve this: View Courses About DriveEasy Welcome to DriveEasy, your trusted partner in learning to drive with confidence and safety. Established with a mission to provide top-notch driving education, DriveEasy has quickly become one of the most respected driving schools in India. Our goal is to equip you with the skills and knowledge necessary to navigate the roads safely and confidently, whether you are a beginner or looking to improve your driving skills. At DriveEasy, we believe that learning to drive should be a positive and enriching experience. Our experienced and certified instructors are dedicated to providing personalized lessons tailored to meet the unique needs of each student. We understand that everyone learns at their own pace, and our patient and supportive teaching approach ensures that you feel comfortable and confident behind the wheel. We offer a wide range of courses to suit all levels of experience, from beginner driving lessons to advanced defensive driving techniques. Our state-of-the-art training vehicles are equipped with the latest safety features, ensuring that you learn in a safe and controlled environment. Additionally, we offer flexible scheduling options, including weekend and evening classes, to accommodate your busy lifestyle. Choosing DriveEasy means choosing excellence in driving education. Join us today and take the first step towards becoming a skilled and responsible driver. Our friendly and professional team is here to support you every step of the way. DriveEasy – driving made easy. View Courses Testimonials from our Happy Graduates! "DriveEasy has been an exceptional experience from start to finish. As a complete beginner, I was quite nervous about learning to drive. However, the instructors at DriveEasy were incredibly patient and supportive, making me feel at ease during every lesson. Their structured approach and clear explanations helped me understand the rules of the road and develop confidence behind the wheel. I am now a confident and safe driver, all thanks to the fantastic team at DriveEasy. Highly recommend to anyone looking to learn driving!" - Aishwarya Sharma "I had previously taken driving lessons at another school but still lacked confidence on the road. Joining DriveEasy was the best decision I made. The instructors here are not only knowledgeable but also very friendly and approachable. They tailored the lessons to address my specific weaknesses and provided continuous feedback, which greatly improved my driving skills. The flexible scheduling was a big plus, allowing me to take lessons around my work commitments. Thank you, DriveEasy, for helping me become a proficient driver!" - Rajesh Kumar "Learning to drive with DriveEasy has been a wonderful journey. From the very first lesson, the professionalism and expertise of the instructors were evident. They made the learning process enjoyable and stress-free with their patient and methodical teaching style. I appreciated how they incorporated real-life driving scenarios into the lessons, which prepared me well for the driving test. The supportive environment and high-quality training at DriveEasy have equipped me with the confidence and skills to drive safely. I highly recommend DriveEasy to anyone looking to learn driving!" - Priya Patel Contacts plot no.1 geetha hospital lane, 1-7-81/1, Chaitanyapuri Main Rd, Dilsukhnagar, Hyderabad, Telangana 500060, India +919963247687 driveeasy@gmail.com Links Home Courses How we work About us Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
pages.privacy: DriveEasy - Premier Driving School in India | Privacy Policy Home Courses How we work About us Privacy Policy At DriveEasy, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website or use our services. Information We Collect We collect personal information that you provide to us when you register for our courses, contact us, or use our website. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you choose to provide. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to: Provide and improve our services Respond to your inquiries and requests Process your course registrations and payments Send you updates, promotional materials, and other information Analyze how our website and services are used Sharing Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties. We may share your information with trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or providing our services, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. Protecting Your Information We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. Your information is stored on secure servers and is only accessible by authorized personnel who have special access rights to such systems. Cookies Our website uses cookies to enhance your experience, gather general visitor information, and track visits to our website. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings, but doing so may affect the functionality of our website. Your Consent By using our website and services, you consent to our Privacy Policy. Changes to Our Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Contact Us If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at: Email: driveeasy@gmail.com Contacts plot no.1 geetha hospital lane, 1-7-81/1, Chaitanyapuri Main Rd, Dilsukhnagar, Hyderabad, Telangana 500060, India +919963247687 driveeasy@gmail.com Links Home Courses How we work About us Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
pages.terms: DriveEasy - Premier Driving School in India | Terms and Conditions Home Courses How we work About us Terms and Conditions Welcome to DriveEasy! By using our website and services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before using our site or services. 1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing and using DriveEasy's website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website or services. 2. Services Provided DriveEasy offers driving lessons and related services. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our services at any time without prior notice. 3. User Responsibilities When using our website and services, you agree to: Provide accurate and complete information during registration and communication. Use our services in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. Not engage in any fraudulent or malicious activity. Maintain the confidentiality of your account and password. 4. Fees and Payments All fees for our courses and services are listed on our website. Payment must be made in full before the start of any course. We accept various payment methods as indicated on our payment page. Fees are non-refundable except as required by law. 5. Cancellation and Refund Policy To cancel or reschedule a driving lesson, please notify us at least 24 hours in advance. Cancellations made within 24 hours of the scheduled lesson may incur a cancellation fee. Refunds for courses are handled on a case-by-case basis and may be subject to administrative fees. 6. Limitation of Liability DriveEasy is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use our website or services. We do not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of any information provided on our site. 7. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of DriveEasy or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content without our express written permission. 8. Privacy Policy Your use of our website and services is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. 9. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and your continued use of our website and services constitutes acceptance of the revised terms. 10. Governing Law These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising under or in connection with these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in India. 11. Contact Us If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at: Email: driveeasy@gmail.com Contacts plot no.1 geetha hospital lane, 1-7-81/1, Chaitanyapuri Main Rd, Dilsukhnagar, Hyderabad, Telangana 500060, India +919963247687 driveeasy@gmail.com Links Home Courses How we work About us Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
